Functions

The following functions are available globally.

  • stringify(json:prettyPrinted:)

    Structures JSON query in String format

    Declaration

    Swift

    public func stringify(json: Any, prettyPrinted: Bool = false) -> String

    Parameters

    json

    JSON query which needs to be converted into String format
    prettyPrinted

    If this option is not true, the most compact possible JSON representation is generated
  • getStreamData(url:credentials:app:type:id:headers:completionHandler:)

    Get streaming updates to a document with the specified id

    Declaration

    Swift

    public func getStreamData(url: String, credentials: String, app: String, type: String, id: String, headers: [String: String]? = nil, completionHandler: @escaping (Any?) -> ())

    Parameters

    url

    URL of the server (If application is hosted on Appbase, url should be scalr.api.appbase.io)
    credentials

    User credentials for authentication (Read Key)
    app

    Name of the application
    type

    Type of data that is created in the app
    id

    ID of query
    headers

    The additional headers which have to be provided

    Return Value

    Received message in JSON format having parameters channel - Path where streaming is made and event - The change that is observed

  • getSearchStreamData(url:credentials:app:type:body:headers:completionHandler:)

    Get streaming updates to a search query provided in the request body

    Declaration

    Swift

    public func getSearchStreamData(url: String, credentials: String, app: String, type: String, body: [String : Any], headers: [String: String]? = nil, completionHandler: @escaping (Any?) -> ())

    Parameters

    url

    URL of the server (If application is hosted on Appbase, url should be scalr.api.appbase.io)
    credentials

    User credentials for authentication (Read Key)
    app

    Name of the application
    type

    Type of data that is created in the app
    body

    Search query of the streaming
    headers

    The additional headers which have to be provided

    Return Value

    Received message in JSON format until the connection is closed
